cause.description:
CHADD CARES! CHADD provides a support network for parents and caregivers; provides a forum for continuing education; is a community resource and disseminates accurate, evidence-based information about AD/HD to parents, educators, adults, professionals, and the media; promotes ongoing research; and is an advocate on behalf of the AD/HD community.
Visit www.chadd.org for further information!
1. Integrity!
2. Communication!
3. Education!
cause.mission: Help improve lives of people living with ADHD!
cause.name: Children and Adults with Attention-Deficit/Hyperactivity Disorder (ADHD)
